sentences.sContent: Did you have any preconceptions about the sort of people who did computing?
sentences.sCn: 你对那些使用计算机的人有什么先入之见吗？

remMethod.val: pre(在前面) + conception(观念) → 先入之见

words.tran: 预想的；（思想或观点）事先形成的
预想（preconceive的过去式和过去分词）
预想，使成先入之见；对…事先加以考虑

trans.tranOther: a belief or opinion that you have already formed before you know the actual facts, and that may be wrong
